imdb.plot outline: Vinyl Addiction is all about the Designer Toys/Urban Vinyl Movement which is often referred to as the next art movement. Growing from its early inception in Asia and slowly spreading to become a world-wide phenomenon, you will witness the crossover of underground art, graffiti, music, and pop culture into the world of collectible toys.
imdb.title: Vinyl Addiction
plot: _Vinyl Addiction_ (qv) is all about the Designer Toys/Urban Vinyl Movement which is often referred to as the next art movement. Growing from its early inception in Asia and slowly spreading to become a world-wide phenomenon, you will witness the crossover of underground art, graffiti, music, and pop culture into the world of collectible toys.::MYX TV
